```{r}
library(here)
library(knitr)
library(htmltools)
chart_paths <- sort(list.files(here::here("replication/charts_ggplot2"), pattern = "^chart_\\d+.*_ggplot2\\.png$", full.names = TRUE))
table_paths <- sort(list.files(here::here("outputs/tables/replication"), pattern = "^table_\\d+.*\\.html$", full.names = TRUE))
```

## Метод и источник данных

- Базовый источник: `outputs_prep_v2/survey_master_cleaned_v2.csv`.
- Все графики собраны из репликационных R-скриптов в `replication/`.
- Таблицы 1–13 воспроизводятся в `outputs/tables/replication/`.

## Графики

```{r}
for (p in chart_paths) {
  id <- sub("_.*", "", basename(p))
  cat("### ", id, "\n\n", sep = "")
  print(knitr::include_graphics(p))
  cat("\n\n")
}
```

## Таблицы

```{r}
for (p in table_paths) {
  id <- sub("_.*", "", basename(p))
  cat("### ", id, "\n\n", sep = "")
  print(htmltools::includeHTML(p))
  cat("\n\n")
}
```
